member.name: PROFILEINFOA
member.summary: Contains information used when loading or unloading a user profile.

member.name: PROFILEINFOA.dwSize
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

summary.para: This member can be one of the following flags:
Prevents the display of profile error messages.

member.name: PROFILEINFOA.lpUserName
member.summary: A pointer to the name of the user. This member is used as the base name of the directory in which to store a new profile.

member.name: PROFILEINFOA.lpProfilePath
member.summary: A pointer to the roaming user profile path. If the user does not have a roaming profile, this member can be NULL. To retrieve the user's roaming profile path, call the function, specifying information level 3 or 4. For more information, see Remarks.

member.name: PROFILEINFOA.lpDefaultPath
member.summary: A pointer to the default user profile path. This member can be NULL.

member.name: PROFILEINFOA.lpServerName
member.summary: A pointer to the name of the validating domain controller, in NetBIOS format.

member.name: PROFILEINFOA.hProfile
member.summary: A handle to the HKEY_CURRENT_USER registry subtree. For more information, see Remarks.
